front.title: Internet Engineering Task Force and International Telecommunication Union - Telecommunications Standardization Sector Collaboration Guidelines

abstract.t: This document provides guidance to aid in the understanding ofcollaboration on standards development between the InternationalTelecommunication Union -- Telecommunication Standardization Sector(ITU-T) and the Internet Society (ISOC) / Internet Engineering TaskForce (IETF). It is an update of and obsoletes [RFC 2436]. Theupdates reflect changes in the IETF and ITU-T since RFC 2436 waswritten. The bulk of this document is common text with ITU-TSupplement 3 to the ITU-T A-Series Recommendations.This was approved by TUT-T TSAG on 30 November 2001 as a supplementto the ITU-T A-Series of recommendations (will be numbered as A-Series Supplement 3)
